metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3514 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OCaml Xml-Light Library before r234 computes hash values without restricting the ability to trigger hash collisions predictably, which allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3514` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-light-ocaml - 2.2-17
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xml-light package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2-17').
